## Load Libraries

```{r}
#| message: false
library("tidyverse")
library("ggplot2")
library("here")
source("99_proj_func.R")
```

## Load data

```{r}
# load data
long_data <- read_csv(here("data/03_dat_aug_02.csv"))
#long_data <- read_csv(here("data/03_dat_aug_02.csv"))
wide_data <- read.csv(here("data/03_dat_aug_01.csv"))
# view data
print(long_data)
print(wide_data)
```

## Analysis

```{r}

ggplot(wide_data, aes(x = log2(pre_count_1), y = log2(post_count_1))) +
  geom_point(size = 1, color = "red") +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm") +
  labs(title = "Scatter Plot of Pre-count vs Post-count Values Patient 1",
       x = "Log2 Pre-count Values",
       y = "Log2 Post-count Values",
       color = "Patient") +
  theme_minimal()
```
